subject: Use of steel of original producer in NHAI projects.
text: HRdq 7cfty  THT gifeasrut TT _ Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (dem 4ae7t 3r ToTAn FATT4) 4TA / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 M1 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vi-5 U 6, #er-10, ERVT; T @arit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 12.08.2013 Policy Matter-Technical (141/2013) (Decision taken in 1 56ih Meeting of EC held on 24.7.2013) Sub: Use of steel of original producer in NHAI projects Circular No.11018/30(21/2006/PQ-Steel dated 5.12.2011 and its corrigendum dated 8.12.2011 (copies enclosed) for use of different brands of steel in NHAI projects is hereby withdrawn: 2. It is clarified that the term used aS original producer of steel shall be as mentioned in 5mh revision of "Specification for Road and Bridges Works' of MoRT&H, as given below; All steel shall be procured form 'Original producers" who manufacture billets   directly from   iron ores and roll the billets to produce steel conforming to IS: 1786. No re-rolled steel shall be incorporated in the works. 3. Definition of original producer as mentioned in clause 1009.3.1 of 5tn revision of "Specitication for Road and Bridges Works" of MoRT&H be provided in all future contracts and concession agreements irrespective of EPC and PPP mode of execution: 4 This issues with the approval of Executive Committee. e& (V.K Sharmd) F Chief General Manager (Coord) To Allofticers and employees of HQ[ROs[PIUs[CMUs[Site Qitices T7 NHAL
